title: Why Linux Powers Everything From Your Coffee Machine to Mars Rovers

content: When most people think about operating systems, they picture Windows laptops or MacBooks, but here’s what’s fascinating: while you’re reading this, Linux is quietly running the world’s infrastructure… [+11930 chars]
